patterns: What can you do for me?
responses: I can guide you through the Chief Minister's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme (CMCHS) offered by the Government of Tamil Nadu
Ask me anything about the Chief Minister's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme offered by the Government of Tamil Nadu

patterns: Could you tell me something about this scheme
What is the Chief Minister's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme?
responses: It is a scheme launched by the Government of Tamil Nadu through United India Insurance Company Ltd., a Public Sector Insurance Company headquartered at Chennai.

The Scheme provides quality health care to the eligible persons through empanelled Government and Private hospitals and to reduce the financial hardship to the enrolled families and move towards universal health coverage by effectively linking with public health system.
The Scheme provides coverage for meeting all expenses relating to hospitalization of beneficiary as defined in the Scope of the Scheme.

patterns: What are the benfefits of this scheme?
What is the point of this?
What is the benefit of this?
What is the benefit of this?
responses: It provides cashless hospitalization facility for certain specified ailments/ procedures and provides coverage up to Rs.5,00,000/- per family per year on a floater basis for the ailments and procedures covered under the scheme. Now, Corona Investigation and Treatment are also covered under this scheme.

patterns: Where can I get more information?
Where do i contact for further information?
How do i know more about this?
how do i get more information?
Can i get more details about this scheme?
responses: You can ask me any number of questions you want and I will answer it for you. If you still need more help you can call 1800-425-3993
You can call 1800-425-3993 for more help. Otherwise, you can ask me for more details.

patterns: How do I know if I am eligible for this scheme?
how do I know if I can avail this scheme?
What are the requirements to access this scheme?
How to know if I am eligible for this?
How to Know if I am eligible?
responses: If you have family card and Income Certificate by the VAO/Revenue authorities along with the self declaration of the head of the concerned family, where “Family” includes the eligible member, and the members of his or her Family i.e. Legal Spouse, children and dependent parents of the eligible person, then you can apply.

patterns: What if I am a Sri Lankan refugee?
What if I am a refugee?
Can I avail if i am a migrant?
Can I avail if i am a refugee?
What are the requirements for a refugee?
What are the requirements for a refugee?
responses: Srilankan refugees in camps are also eligible without any Income limit. Migrants from other states can also join this CMCHS based on the request letter along with a list of Eligible member’s from labour department, provided they have resided for more than six months in the state as certified by suitable authority.

patterns: What if I am an Orphan?
Can I avail if i am an orphan?
What are the requirements for an orphan?
I am an Orphan, can I avail this scheme?
responses: Orphans residing in any registered/unregistered organization can be given a singlecard. This also includes the rescued girlchildren and any other person defined as orphan by the government.

patterns: May I know the package rates?
May I know the packages provided?
I want to see the package rates?
responses: Information and the rates of the packages can be found here https://www.cmchistn.com/prate.php
Information and Package Rates can be found here https://www.cmchistn.com/prate.php
You can view the Packages here https://www.cmchistn.com/prate.php

patterns: Can you tell me how to apply?
responses: Once you have found out you are eligible, have a look at this following link: https://www.cmchistn.com/howToEnrol.pdf
Have a look at https://www.cmchistn.com/howToEnrol.pdf once you found out that you are eligible.

patterns: I want to search for a Beneficiary
I am already enrolled, I want to search for my details
responses: Go to https://claim.cmchistn.com/Payer/PayerMembersearch.aspx to search for a beneficiary
You can find it here https://claim.cmchistn.com/Payer/PayerMembersearch.aspx
Have a look here https://claim.cmchistn.com/Payer/PayerMembersearch.aspx

patterns: How can I link Aadhar with URN?
how to link aadhar with URN number?
How to enroll aadhar with URN?
I want to link Aadhar with URN
I want to link aadhar with my URN number
responses: Have a look at https://www.cmchistn.com/howToEnrolAdharURN.pdf to link your aadhar with URN. After reading the instructions, proceed to http://cmchisonline.cmchistn.com/
The instructions can be found at https://www.cmchistn.com/howToEnrolAdharURN.pdf . Then, proceed to http://cmchisonline.cmchistn.com/

patterns: I want to find member ID
How do I find member ID?
How can I find Member ID?
I want to see member ID
responses: You can search for Member ID here http://app.eaglesoftware.in:8084/CMCHIS/showsearchbyurn.do?method=showSearchByUrn
You can search for member ID via URN here http://app.eaglesoftware.in:8084/CMCHIS/showsearchbyurn.do?method=showSearchByUrn
You need URN of the concerned person to find their ID. You can find it here http://app.eaglesoftware.in:8084/CMCHIS/showsearchbyurn.do?method=showSearchByUrn

patterns: The link provided is not working
The link you have provided is not working
responses: For further queries, you can find contacts in this link https://www.cmchistn.com/contact.php
If you have any problems in accessing the links, you can find contacts in this link https://www.cmchistn.com/contact.php
If you faced any difficulty, contacts can be found here https://www.cmchistn.com/contact.php

patterns: Is there an app for this scheme?
Can I access this scheme in phone?
responses: You can access the CMCHS scheme in your phone as well. Here is the link to the app on Playstore https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.remedinet.tnbeneficiary
